<Text: 1961 Night Series Cup: Run as a knock-out tournament, it was contested by the eight VFL teams that failed to make the 1961 VFL finals series.>

Text: 1961 Night Series Cup:  Games were played at the Lake Oval, Albert Park, then the home ground of South Melbourne, as it was the only ground equipped to host night games.
